nodes.text: Nexus Ortai was a Mid Rim planet located at the intersection of two hyperlanes. It was considered a peaceful world.
A battle took place during the Clone Wars between forces of the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems, both vying for control of its strategic position.
After the loss of Nexus Ortai, Mace Windu noted that it was nearly the twenty-fourth world to fall in the region.
Nexus Ortai was conquered by the Yuuzhan Vong during their invasion of the galaxy.
